string.text:
You pull up to the driveway of the family holiday home and park the car.
It's dark, but it's as idyllic as you remember from all that time ago.
You remember being told to look in the glovebox before going in.
It's good to be back.

It's a nice clean car.
Not much to see, but there is a glove box.
The glove box is open, and you have taken its contents.
The glove box is closed but appears to be unlocked.

The inside of the glovebox is empty.
You have taken its contents.

Inside is a key, and a handwritten note from Dad.
You take both.
You open the car door and step out...

The house is grand, sat perfectly amongst the trees.
In front of you is the front door, and the yard stretches around the back of the house.

The trees stretch up to the night sky.
There is the house and the yard.
You step inside the front door...

The door appears to be locked.
You will need to use a key.

You insert the key and turn.
The door lock clicks open.
You do not have a key.

You approach the house.
Infront of you is an unlocked door.

You approach the house.
The door is closed and you cannot enter.
You walk around to the yard.

You walk through to the yard.
You spent a lot of time here with your family on holiday trips.
Good memories.

You enter the house to the hallway.
It's dark and you can't see anything.
You feel a light switch next to the door however.
